name: CStack
description: Container Stack (CStack) is a cloud-based container development and hosting platform that allows agencies to jumpstart their DevSecOps practices and accelerate their journey into agile application development. As a fully managed developer platform that provides an end-to-end development experience for application teams, CStack enables engineers to build and deploy containers onto a shared platform with built-in security and compliance. Our team is responsible for the platform operations while agencies can focus on developing applications and save on the overheads of maintaining infrastructure.

resources.name: Case Studies - Launching the Thank You 'Cher portal on CStack
